definition: to thank sb for favor (esp. emperor or superior official)
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: For if I by grace be a partaker, why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks?
sentences.chinese: 我若謝恩而喫，爲什麼因我謝恩的物被人毀謗呢。

sentences.english: For if I by grace be a partaker, why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks?
sentences.chinese: 我若謝恩而喫，爲什麼因我謝恩的物被人毀謗呢。

sentences.english: Tell you what, why don’t you write a special grace for tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 跟你說吧，你幹嗎不爲明天特別寫一個謝恩禱告呢？

sentences.english: The tests showed people who didn't sleep at all had lower immunity, says Dr.Shane.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示不睡覺的人身體免疫力低下，謝恩博士說。

definition: to plot a rebellion/to conspire against the state
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
